title: How to Make Glow in the Dark Sticks Last Longer

steps.headline: Place your glow-in-the-dark stick in the freezer.
Leave it there when not in use.
Defrost before you wish to use it.
steps.description: Take the stick out before you intend to use it, to allow it to defrost (at least one hour in advance).

steps.headline: Repeat the freeze/thaw cycle until your glow-in-the-dark stick is no longer able to glow.
steps.description: The freezing method will allow your glow-in-the-dark stick to last at least several more turns before it gives up. Instead of lasting for at least 12 -24 hours, it can last at least for a day or more.
